name: Kunoichi - Ninja Revenge
description:
Coming home, you find your family is "Not There"
Ninjas have taken them. So go get revenge, kill 'em all and recover your family.

Controls:
Cursor Keys, S/D or X/C - Move, Shuriken/Jump
Return - START

Cursor Keys move Target Reticule about.
Left and Right to make your Ninja run left and right.
While Jumping you are invincible.

You have 5 lives, represented by the petals at the top left.
Destroy fences to get to the Ninjas.
Kill them all and get the HiScore.

Credits.
Pixel Art: Viet Nguyen @GeekyVee
Audio: Cain McCormack @CainMcCormack
Coding: Quang Nguyen @Asobitech
Voice acting: Liz Mercuri @FragFox
